item.title: Lighting Solution Using the Eclipse Kapua and Eclipse Kura Platforms | Virtual IoT
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: We followed the Eclipse IoT software evolution and found it appropriate to incorporate it in our software architecture. We implemented our solution using two main Eclipse projects, namely Eclipse Kapua and Eclipse Kura. Our end-to-end architecture involves these two modules at its core, forming the most essential parts of our lighting solution.
